name: Harbinger of Wrath
description: The Harbinger of Wrath is a gargantuan construct with adamantine weapons and a chaotic evil nature. It boasts a formidable presence with a high armor class and hit points, making it a powerful melee combatant.
memorable: Its ability to drain life and impale foes adds to its fearsome reputation.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate opponents and drain the life from foes.
relations: Often encountered alongside other constructs or evil entities.
environment: Typically found in dark, foreboding places or locations controlled by evil wizards or creators.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores lead to devastating melee attacks and durability.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity results in slower movements and less agility.
attacks: Utilizes slam attacks with significant bludgeoning damage and can impale grappling targets.
most_powerful_ability: The Drain Life ability allows it to sap life from impaled foes, potentially absorbing their souls.
equipment: Wields adamantine weapons capable of bypassing many forms of damage resistance.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and magical darkness.
additional_information: Immunities to cold, fire, poison, psychic, and nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons.
Immutable Form grants immunity to forms of alteration.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws.
Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
Can use Spike Volley to control the battlefield with area damage.
test_queries: monster that drains life and impales foes
creature with magical resistance and life-draining abilities
